title: Cybernetic Laser Guns SFX: Pack1
description: From single gunshots to relentless bursts – Hear the difference with this laser gunshots SFX pack!
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO - BURSTS

AUDIO DEMO - SINGLE GUNSHOTS


Unleash the combat with ''Cybernetic Laser Guns SFX: Pack1'', our carefully created collection of top-quality laser guns sounds perfect for fighting, sci-fi, space wars, modern combats, military, and similar genres.


Key Features:


Unique Sounds: Every sound in this pack is unique, providing a diverse array of options to enhance your game’s auditory landscape.


Two Distinct Categories:

  • Gunshots: Featuring a variety of single laser gun fires, each with its unique character and intensity.
  • Bursts (Loops): Includes looping automatic machinegun rounds, perfect for sustained firefights and intense combat scenarios.


Versatile Usage: Whether you’re designing a futuristic space battle or a high-tech military operation, these sounds are versatile enough to fit a wide range of laser or sci-fi guns.


High-Quality Audio: Each sound effect is produced with pristine clarity and depth, ensuring your game sounds as realistic and engaging as possible.


Immersive Experience: The high-quality, distinct sounds will draw players deeper into the game world, making every shot and burst feel impactful.


Wide Usabibility: Ideal for various game genres, from sci-fi adventures to modern military simulations.


Professional Grade: This pack, created by expert sound designers, ensures your game audio meets industry standards.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 299


Bursts (Loops) : 161 Sounds

Single Gunshots: 138 Sounds


Number of Audio Waves: 299 + 299 + 299

Number of Audio Cues: 299 + 299 + 299

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz-24bit + 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, Included

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 6:02

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
